title: Order sampling distribution graphs by sample size

content.description: The histograms show the results of three simulations of a sampling distribution of a sample mean. For each simulation, 1,500 samples of size n were selected from the same population and the sample mean was recorded. The value of n was different for each of the three simulations.
content.question: Which of the following is the correct ordering of the graphs from least value of n to greatest value of n?

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
